name: Nahuatl
description:
Controls

  • 1-5: Weapons
  • WASD: Move
  • Left Mouse: Shoot/Attack
  • P: Pause
  • M: Toggle Music

After an evil cult performed an evil sacrifice during their evil ritual of doom, only their evilest of ancestors answered the call.

The spirits inside the tomb of Nahuatl have awoken, and you are unfortunate enough to be there with them. Survive all 5 waves to escape this hell on earth!

Tips

  • Collect hearts to restore health
  • There's 5 weapons to find, one of them only appears after you reach wave 3

Nahuatl runs on a 64x64 resolution, and was made for #LOWREZJAM 2022.
